TitlePage.Acknowledgements: I am grateful to John P. McDermott for the discovery that the group discussed in Section is isomorphic to Thompson's Group V in July 2008, and to Laurent Bartholdi for his hint on how to construct wreath products of residue-class-wise affine groups with (&ZZ;,+) in April 2006. Further, I thank Bettina Eick for communicating this package and for her valuable suggestions on its manual in the time before its first public release in April 2005. Last but not least I thank the two anonymous referees for their constructive criticism and their helpful suggestions.
